Package domain

Class CtrlDomainLayer

java.lang.Object
domain.CtrlDomainLayer
public class CtrlDomainLayer extends Object
Class Ctrl_domain_layer. It's the controller of the domain layer and executes every operation available in the system. There can only exist one instance of the class CtrlDomainLayer.
Version:
v1.0 | 07/11/2021
Author:
Daniel García Estévez, Guillem González Valdivia, Eloi Balaer Morales, Daniel Morón Roces

  • Field Details

    • Items

      private TreeMap<Integer,Item> Items
      Non static attribute Items. Its default value is set to the void constructor (new TreeMap<Integer,Item>). Some examples can be: {(1, Item a),(2, Item b),(3, Item c)} or {(1642, Item z)}. Array of Items sorted in increasing order by its id. It contains all the items of the same type stored in Data.

    • itemType

      private ItemType itemType
      Non static attribute itemType. Its default value is set to the void constructor of the class ItemType (new ItemType()). A class itemType that contains the type of items we're dealing with, alongside with the diferent attributes of this type of items.

    • Users

      private ArrayList<User> Users
      Non static attribute Users. Its default value is set to the void constructor of the ArrayList structure (new ArrayList<_User_>()). Array of users sorted increasingly by its id, and containing, for each user, its id and its reviews.

    • active_user

      private Integer active_user
      Non static attribute active_user. Its default value is set to -1. Integer representing the id of the active user that is currently running the application. It is also a user in Users list.

    • ActiveUsers

      private ArrayList<ActiveUser> ActiveUsers
      Non static attribute ActiveUsers. Its default value is set to the void constructor of ArrayList (new ArrayList<_ActiveUsers_>()). Every active user sorted in increasing order by its id. These active users can be administrator or not.

    • activeRec

      private Recommendation activeRec
      Non static attribute activeRec. Its default value is set to the void constructor of Recommendation (new Recommendation()). Object of the type Recommendation that holds the current recommendation of the active user logged in the system.

    • Reviews

      private ArrayList<Review> Reviews
      Non static attribute Reviews. Its default value is set to the void constructor of ArrayList (new ArrayList<_Reviews_>()); Array of Review that holds every review that one user has made to an item of the type of items itemType. Increasingly sorted by the id of user, then increasingly by the id of an item, and finally decreasingly by the valuation.

    • Unknown

      private ArrayList<Review> Unknown
      Non static attribute Unknown. Its default value is set to the void constructor of ArrayList (new ArrayList<_Review_>()); Array of Review that holds the 10 most liked items of one user. It's information for testing. It is sorted by the same criteria as the Reviews array.

    • Known

      private ArrayList<Review> Known
      Non static attribute Known. Its default value is set to the void constructor of ArrayList (new ArrayList<_Review_>()); Array of Review that holds more reviews for the same items of the system. It's information for testing. It is sorted by the same criteria as the Reviews array.

    • strategy

      private Integer strategy
      Non static attribute strategy. Integer representing the strategy we're using to generate the recommendations. The possible values that can get are: 0 to collaborative filtering. 1 to content based. 2 to hybrid approaches. -1 to set default case (no recommendation).

    • ctrlData

      private CtrlDataLayer ctrlData
      Non static attribute ctrlData. Its default value is set to the method CtrlDataLayer.getInstance(). Instance of the class CtrlDataLayer that communicates the domain layer with the data layer. It provides the program all the information stored in memory to create recommendations, give already made recommendations... And all the functionalities this application has.

    • maxValuation

      private Double maxValuation
      Non static attribute maxValuation. Its default value is set to 0.0. Integer that holds the maximum valuation for a fiven set of reviews. It's used to calculate the range of the possible valuations that one type of item can hold.

  • Constructor Details

    • CtrlDomainLayer

      public CtrlDomainLayer()
      Public void constructor CtrlDomainLayer().

    • CtrlDomainLayer

      public CtrlDomainLayer(String itemType, Integer activeUser, int strategy)
      Public constructor for testing in driver.

  • Method Details

    • inicializeDomainLayer

      public void inicializeDomainLayer()
      Public constructor for initialising the controller for the domain layer. This method creates a new instance of CtrlDomainLayer class with default values on its attributes.

    • dataLoad

      public void dataLoad()
      Public method dataLoad(). Method to charge the data from the .txt and .csv files into the program itself. It also sorts the information by diverse criteria.

    • getAlgorithm

      public Integer getAlgorithm()
      Public method getAlgorithm(). It returns the strategy it's currently being used. As we say previously the meaning of attribute strategy is:
      • 0 to collaborative filtering
      • 1 to content based
      • 2 to hybrid approaches
      • -1 to set default case (no recommendation)
      Returns:
      strategy Returns the current strategy used when given recommendations.

    • setAlgorithm

      public void setAlgorithm(Integer alg)
      Public method setAlgorithm(). Sets a new strategy, as we say previously the meaning of the attribute strategy is:
      • 0 to collaborative filtering
      • 1 to content based
      • 2 to hybrid approaches
      • -1 to set default case (no recommendation)
      Parameters:
      alg - Number of the algorithm to use.

    • recommend

      public void recommend()
      Public method recommend(). Method to produce a new recommendation. The main part of the program is executed by this procedure. Following the value of this.strategy attribute, it provides the user a new recommendation made with the information stored in the program a the moment.

      • Collaborative filtering for value of strategy 0
      • Content based filtering for value of strategy 1
      • Hybrid approaches for value of strategy 2

    • binarySearchReviewUser

      private Integer binarySearchReviewUser(Integer id)
      Private method binarySearchReviewUser(). Returns the position of the first Review of the given user.
      Parameters:
      id - Identifier of the user we're looking for.
      Returns:
      The position of the first Review of the user id, if exists; -1 otherwise.

    • binarySearchUser

      private Integer binarySearchUser(Integer id)
      Private method binarySearchUser(). Binary search for a position of a user in the array of users Users.
      Parameters:
      id - .
      Returns:
      m The position of the user in the list of users.

    • binarySearchReviewUserItem

      private Integer binarySearchReviewUserItem(Integer id, Integer item)
      Private method binarySearchReviewUserItem(). Binary search for a position of a review that a user has made. If the review not exists returns -1.
      Parameters:
      id - identifier for the user we want to find its review.
      item - identifier for the item we want to find its review.
      Returns:
      An integer that's the position where the review is located. If not found returns -1.

    • userDistance

      private Double userDistance(Integer id1, ArrayList<Pair<Integer,Double>> val2)
      Private method userDistance(). This method calculates the distance between two users given by its id's, using the reviews of the users.
      Parameters:
      id1 - Identifier of the first user.
      id2 - Identifier of the second user.
      Returns:
      dist Distance between the two users.

    • computeCentroid

      private Pair<Integer,ArrayList<Pair<Integer,Double>>> computeCentroid(ArrayList<Integer> users)
      Private method computeCentroid(). Methos to compute, using an array of users, a new imaginary centroid with minimum sum of distances to every user in the set given.
      Parameters:
      users - ArrayList of user identifiers of a subset from a partition of k-means.
      Returns:
      centroid The centroid of the given array.

    • collaborativeFiltering

      private Recommendation collaborativeFiltering()
      Private method collaborativeFiltering(). One of the two algorithms to generate a new recommendation. Applying K-means and Slope one, this method creates a new recommendation by doing this: First, it computes k clusters of users with minimum distance between them and associates the active user with one cluster; then uses the users of the cluster related to the active user to calculate an approximated estimation to the reviews the active user could make to a set of items that the users of the cluster have reviewed. Finally, inserts the items of maximum expected valuation into the recommendation.
      Returns:
      Recommendation R aplying collaborative filtering.

    • contentBased

      private Recommendation contentBased()
      Private method contentBased(). The second and last of the algorithms to generate a new recommendation. This method applies K-nearest neighbours. The algorithm gets the items liked by the user (the criteria to see of an item is liked by the active user it that if the valuation given to an item is equal or higher than the maximum valuation possible to give divided by 2). Then, using these items, we get the k closest items to those of the list returned before and we create a recommendation with these items.
      Returns:
      Recommendation R obtained from the current recommendation aplying content-based

    • calculateDCG

      private Double calculateDCG(Recommendation R)
      Private method calculateDCG(). This method calculates the quality of the new recommendation. Given a recommendation, it compares the items of the recommendation with the items in Unknown list or reviews
      Parameters:
      R - New recommendation computed with collaborative filtering, content based or hybrid approaches.
      Returns:
      DCG Real number which gives the quality of the current recommendation in the system.
